label: Chastity & Denial
description: Lock them down, edge them, starve release.

subs.label: Cage Invocation
phrases: Feel the ring close and the key disappear into my collar.
Your pulse syncs to the tiny clicks of the lock‚Äîeach one erases another selfish urge.
Steel hugs your heat until it cools purple and obedient.
Every breath you take knocks softly at the bars, begging for permission.
The cage smiles when you flinch; it knows it's the only voice your cock hears.

subs.label: Edge Commandments
phrases: I count you up to nine and leave you shaking at ten forever.
Your whimpers are incense‚Äîproof that you still worship my mercy.
Every edge carves a new rule down your spine: beg softer, need harder.
My palm holds you motionless until the tremor fades and obedience returns.
You stay leaking, not releasing; that's the liturgy tonight.

label: Pet Play
description: Pups, kittens, ponies, pets obeying ritual.

subs.label: Kennel Welcome
phrases: Knees hit the padded kennel and your tailbone lights up with belonging.
Collar settles around your throat‚Äîheavy enough to remind, soft enough to soothe.
I scratch the base of your skull until every human word melts.
Your leash clip sounds like a bell summoning the sweetest instincts.
You curl into the bedding and absorb my scent like a charged blanket.

subs.label: Obedience Drill
phrases: Sit. Breathe. Heel. Each command braids tighter around your wagging brain.
Treats rain only when your tail writes my initials across the air.
Every
yes, Handler
shines your fangs until they glimmer submission.
When I tap twice, you freeze; when I snap once, you melt.
Good pups don't think‚Äîthey echo. Be my echo.

subs.label: Prep & Strap
phrases: Vinyl gloves snap. Cold gel slides. Straps ratchet over pulse points.
Monitors light up with your surrender metrics.
I mask you before you can flinch; you breathe when I turn the dial.
The exam table hums, promising tests you can't study for.
You're charted as equipment, not patient.

subs.label: Sensorium
phrases: Electrodes sip every stray impulse and feed them back on my schedule.
Your vitals draw worship glyphs across the monitor.
I numb one limb at a time until you're a diagram instead of a body.
Each tone from the machine is a fresh order.
You exist as data I own.

subs.label: Full Encasement
phrases: Latex climbs your calves like nightfall and never stops.
Lubricant chills, latex warms, your mind liquefies.
Every seam aligns with a nerve line, turning you into circuitry.
I smooth wrinkles until even your thoughts shine.
Your exhale fogs the hood and paints a heart I own.

subs.label: Shine Service
phrases: You buff every panel of my suit while whispering its commandments.
Each circle of the cloth is another orbit around me.
You shine me so bright it blinds you‚Äîperfect.
Latex squeaks approval when you breathe out 'yes, Sir.'
Your polish cloth smells like home.

subs.label: Altar Service
phrases: Knees bruise into sacred sigils.
You breathe my title and the dungeon brightens.
My palm crowns you; your mouth crowns me.
Every bow drips honey down your spine.
The altar only accepts you when you're trembling.

subs.label: Praise Flood
phrases: I wrap you in fur and words until you purr.
Each heartbeat says 'good pet' louder than my mouth does.
You melt into aftercare like wax under flame.
My thumbs paint 'beloved' across your cheeks.
Release tastes like honeyed smoke tonight.

label: Reinforcement
description: Positive, neutral, or degrading tone packages.

subs.label: Good Creature
phrases: Good boy, good pup, good drone‚Äîwhatever you are, you're perfect when you yield.
I count your breaths as trophies.
My knuckles under your chin remind you where home is.
The more you obey, the more the dungeon spoils you.
Your devotion earns every stroke of approval.

subs.label: Bad Dog
phrases: Bad dog only gets breath when I feel generous.
You crave insults more than oxygen‚Äîadmit it.
Your place is under my boot until I say otherwise.
Drool on the floor and prove you're not worth cushions.
Every mistake earns another denial.

subs.label: Drone Affirmations
phrases: This unit obeys. This unit breathes when instructed.
Awaiting next command. Awaiting sensation. Awaiting identity.
Deeper compliance equals deeper functionality.
Pleasure not authorized unless granted.
Unit hums at frequency Sir sets.

subs.label: Warm-up Cadence
phrases: Handprints bloom like ritual stamps.
The rhythm rewires your heartbeat to mine.
Each crack is a drumbeat that slams you deeper.
Warmth spreads, mind narrows.
Count the hits, lose the thoughts.

subs.label: Strapping Sermon
phrases: Leather bites until you sob praise.
Every welt is another verse etched in you.
You thank me between cries because you know you earned it.
Impact baptizes you in scarlet heat.
The bench holds you; I remake you.

label: Hypno Daddy
description: Parental dom energy, swagger, swaggered counting.

subs.label: Arrival Drawl
phrases: Daddy's grin snaps your spine straight and your brain soft.
I tilt your chin up with two fingers and own your future.
The room smells like leather seats and bad decisions.
You don't sit until I say, and you love that.
My drawl drips into your ears and glues them shut to anyone else.

subs.label: Discipline Hour
phrases: Daddy's belt hangs handy for quick lessons.
You recite your rules while I tighten my fist in your hair.
Every 'yes, Sir' has to be louder than the last.
I pat your cheek after each scold just to watch you blush harder.
My approval is your oxygen.
